FormColumnMD.Description: *Text comment on the audit trail entry. Also indicates how the user was authenticated. The method can be one of the following: 1. "DATABASE" - authentication was done by password. 2. "NETWORK" - authentication was done by Net8 or the Advanced Networking Option. 3. "PROXY" - the client was authenticated by another user. The name of the proxy user follows the method type.
